pullrequest.title: Add test for rotational joints, fix some bullet joints

content.raw: I was thinking about it, but I wasn't sure how to implement it. For example, the [ServerFixture class](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/0332ac8db9b76a8025d8c6ed2fa0bee3bb526836/test/ServerFixture.hh?at=default#cl-61) inherits from `public testing::TestWithParam<T>` with type `const char*` that we're using for the physics engine type. Perhaps we should define a class `ServerFixtureParams` that would contain all the parameters that we could want to change? And then have `ServerFixture` inherit from `public testing::TestWithParam<ServerFixtureParams>`?
content.html: I was thinking about it, but I wasn't sure how to implement it. For example, the ServerFixture class inherits from public testing::TestWithParam<T> with type const char* that we're using for the physics engine type. Perhaps we should define a class ServerFixtureParams that would contain all the parameters that we could want to change? And then have ServerFixture inherit from public testing::TestWithParam<ServerFixtureParams>?
